title: Master of Movement
description: Learn and master the art of movement (use WASD).

title: Master of Combat
description: Learn and master the art of combat (use Left Click).

title: Master of Dodging
description: Learn and master the art of dodging (use Shift).

title: The Book
description: Open you're bestiary and learn about the creatures\nyou've encountered (use Tab).

title: Potions Everywhere
description: Select from the potion inventory a Vita Potion (use P)\nand heal yourself (use Q).

title: Speak with the Barkeeper
description: Speak with the barkeeper and learn about the world around you.\nThe tavern is located in the center of the village.

title: The Village
description: Explore the village and learn about the world around you.

title: The Forest
description: Explore the forest. It is located to the north of the village.

title: Breaking Bad
description: Use the cauldron to craft a potion.\nIt is located in the back of the tavern.

title: Warrior or Mage
description: Choose your path. You can become a warrior or a mage.\nGo to you're room and choose wisely.

title: Explore the Forest
description: Go deeper into the forest and discover its secrets.

title: Discover the Flora
description: Discover the Flora of the forest.

title: Discover the Fauna
description: Discover the Fauna of the forest.
